body_html:
You might want to visit https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/index-select-with-dataparallel-arguments-are-located-on-different-gpus/10229/7.

I am not sure if you provided the whole full script. Just be careful when using module list. If you net contains a list of modules in a list then you might want to associate your modules to base net self-object. Or use nn.Modulelist(list_of_modules).

body:
You might want to visit https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/index-select-with-dataparallel-arguments-are-located-on-different-gpus/10229/7.

I am not sure if you provided the whole full script. Just be careful when using module list. If you net contains a list of modules in a list then you might want to associate your modules to base net self-object. Or use nn.Modulelist(list_of_modules).
